page.title: 03A MOTHER'S DAY IN NORTH YATE
page.content: I get up at 6.45am. I go downstairs, make my husband's and Samantha's lunch. My husband leaves for work at approximately 7.30am. I go back upstairs, get dressed, washed, and make the bed. At 8.00am, I get Samantha up, and get her clothes ready for school. I make her breakfast and leave for school at about 8.40am. I return at 9.15am. I have a cup of coffee and look at the paper. I wash the dishes, put on the washing, and dust, tidy and vacuum. Then I clean the bathroom and tidy the bedrooms. I go shopping, and have lunch at 1.00pm. I read, then fetch Sam from school at 3.30pm. We get home at 4.00pm. I start preparing the evening meal, which we eat at 6.00pm. I wash the dishes at about 6.45pm, and sit down to watch television at about 7.30pm. I have a bath, and go to bed at about 11.00pm.
